snippet: Is the Occupy Wall Street movement petering out, or has it already won a big victory by shaping the political campaign of 2012?
abstract: Is the Occupy Wall Street movement petering out, or has it already won a big victory by shaping the political campaign of 2012?
lead_paragraph: Is Occupy Wall Street petering out? Or, more provocatively, has the protest movement already won a big battle and is now watching that victory unfold?

headline.main: The Occupy Movement May Be in Retreat, but Its Ideas Are Advancing
